channel.title: Error when launch
channel.description:
Hello,
I just bought Black Mesa few minutes ago, and when I successfully installed the game and try to launch it it popped up some kind of error code:
Error! Unable to load C:\Program Files\Steam\steamapps\common\Black Mesa\bin\fileststem_stdio.dll
please help asap, or I will consider refund.
P.S. I bought it on Steam P.S2 I'm using 32bit WinXP

item.title: Error when launch
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
My personal workaround to the issue is to join us in 2016, or even 2008 and upgrade from XP. I can’t imagine an obscure XP-only issue is the highest of priorities right now.

Read full topic

item.title: Error when launch
item.dc:creator: CPU
item.description:
CPU:

@Fr0z3n (Developer)

What’s the status on the XP issue that won’t allow the game to run.

"Unable to load C:\Program Files\Steam\steamapps\common\BlackMesa\bin\filesystem_stdio.dll "

RESPONSE:

It’s being looked at, but our bugfix list is longer than the wait for HL3 atm. We’ll get to it as soon as we can

Read full topic

item.title: Error when launch
item.dc:creator: ANGRY_STAN
item.description:
ehh… so are there any ways to solve this problem? The requirement list said this game can run under 32bit WinXp.

Read full topic

item.title: Error when launch
item.dc:creator: RedEye
item.description:
This might be an issue only with XP.
Here are some other threads
https://steamcommunity.com/app/362890/discussions/0/458607518211927801/

and

https://steamcommunity.com/app/362890/discussions/0/458606877333283557/

Read full topic

item.title: Error when launch
item.dc:creator: CPU
item.description:
The filesystem_stdio.dll file might have been corrupted or deleted by a failed Steam upgrade or other install process, perhaps because of a Windows restart. Uninstall and then reinstall the game.

Read full topic
